channel.title: Weapon Speed
channel.description: I've got 2 questions. The first one is: How do I make the attacking speed of my weapon faster. (hits faster after eachother) and my 2nd is: How do i make the maul special like in real rs... That it hits imidiatly when u turn on the special

and my 2nd is:
